title: Ensure 'Interact with and share R and Python' visuals is disabled
description: Disable the ability to interact with and share R and Python visuals in Microsoft Fabric to reduce risk of code execution vulnerabilities.
displayName: Ensure 'Interact with and share R and Python' visuals is disabled
rationale: Disabling R and Python visuals reduces the risk of code execution vulnerabilities and potential data exfiltration.
impact: Users will not be able to use R or Python visuals, which may affect advanced analytics scenarios.

remediation.text:
1. Navigate a Microsoft Fabric https://app.powerbi.com/admin-portal
2. Select Tenant settings.
3. Scroll to Export and Sharing settings.
4. Disable 'Interact with and share R and Python visuals'.
